    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1278</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Social Action and Responsibility1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialtätigkeit und Responsibility1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Action sociale et Responsibility1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ação social e Responsibility1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Azione sociale e Responsibility1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικά ενέργεια και Responsibility1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acción social y Responsibility1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners are introduced to the the concept of "Tikkun Olam" and study several Jewish sources. They arrive at a working definition of the term chesed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chesed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tikun olam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">social action</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rsponsibility</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger werden zum Konzept von "Tikkun Olam" 
eingeführt und einige jüdische Quellen studieren. Sie kommen 
zu einer Arbeitsdefinition der Bezeichnung chesed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">des étudiants sont présentés l'au concept de 
"Tikkun Olam" et étudient plusieurs sources juives. Ils 
arrivent à une définition fonctionnante de la limite chesed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners são introduzidos o ao conceito de 
"Tikkun Olam" e estudam diversas fontes jewish. Chegam em uma 
definição trabalhando do termo chesed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti sono introdotti al concetto "di 
Tikkun Olam" e studiano parecchie sorgenti ebree. Arrivano ad 
una definizione di funzionamento del termine chesed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι εισάγονται στην έννοια "Tikkun Olam" 
και μελετούν διάφορες εβραϊκές πηγές. Φθάνουν σε έναν 
καθορισμό εργασίας του όρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">introducen el concepto de "Tikkun Olam" y 
estudian a los principiantes varias fuentes judías. Llegan una 
definición de trabajo del término chesed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chesed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tikun olam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialtätigkeit</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
